_circuit_breaker_help: Trigger if balance drops this % from peak (e.g., -15.0 = 15% drop)
_daily_loss_limit_help: Trigger if daily loss exceeds this % (e.g., -5.0 = 5% daily loss)
_cooldown_help: Hours before reset is allowed after trigger (default: 24)
_state_file_help: File to store kill switch state
_emergency_file_help: Touch this file to trigger emergency stop
